element.label: Default max record length
element.name: default_max_record_length

element.hint: The file name to be used when Relay sends the file to the destionation server. ST expression language is supported. For example: ${basename(transfer.target)}.${timestamp}
element.label: Destination file
element.name: destination_file

element.hint: The folder name where the files will be uploaded on the destionation server.
element.label: Destination folder
element.name: destination_folder

element.label: File record format
element.name: file_record_format

element.label: Maximum record length
element.name: maximum_record_length

element.hint: Flow unique identifier. The IDF is used in each step in a flow when transferring files by PESIT protocol.
element.label: Flow IDF
element.name: pesit_flow_idf

element.hint: The file name to be used when file is received on the Relay server. The file is relative to the user home folder. The field supports ST regular expressions.
element.label: Relay receive file as
element.name: relay_receive_file_as

element.label: SFTP transfer mode
element.name: sftp_transfer_mode

element.label: File encoding
element.name: source_file_type
